forecasts.title: Enterprise Cloud Infrastructure Modernization
forecasts.description: Comprehensive cloud migration and infrastructure modernization services for DOD enterprise systems. Scope includes assessment, migration planning, implementation, and ongoing support.

forecasts.title: Cybersecurity Operations and Maintenance
forecasts.description: Cybersecurity operations, monitoring, incident response, and maintenance services for Naval Information Warfare Systems Command (NAVWAR). Includes 24/7 SOC operations.

forecasts.title: Infrastructure Engineering Services - Omaha District
forecasts.description: Professional engineering services for water resources, environmental restoration, and infrastructure projects across the Omaha District region.

forecasts.title: Base Operations Support Services
forecasts.description: Comprehensive base operations support including facility maintenance, grounds keeping, and facility management services for multiple Air Force installations.

forecasts.title: IT Modernization and Application Development
forecasts.description: Custom software development, application modernization, and IT consulting services for DHS mission-critical systems. Focus on cloud-native development and DevSecOps.

forecasts.title: Medical Equipment Maintenance Services
forecasts.description: Preventive and corrective maintenance services for biomedical equipment across VA medical centers nationwide. Includes calibration and repair services.

forecasts.title: Research and Development Engineering Services
forecasts.description: Advanced R&D engineering support for aerospace systems development, testing, and analysis. Includes systems engineering and technical advisory services.

forecasts.title: Building Renovation and Construction
forecasts.description: Design-build services for federal building renovations, including HVAC upgrades, electrical systems modernization, and ADA compliance improvements.

forecasts.title: Training and Simulation Systems
forecasts.description: Development and deployment of advanced training simulators and simulation systems for Army personnel. Includes VR/AR capabilities and maintenance support.

forecasts.title: Renewable Energy Infrastructure Development
forecasts.description: Engineering and construction services for renewable energy projects at DOE facilities. Focus on solar, wind, and energy storage systems.

forecasts.title: Border Technology Integration Services
forecasts.description: Integration and deployment of surveillance systems, sensors, and communications equipment along the border. Includes installation and technical support.

forecasts.title: Facility Sustainment and Modernization - Atlantic
forecasts.description: Design, construction, and renovation services for Navy shore facilities in the Atlantic region. Multi-discipline engineering and construction management.

forecasts.title: Environmental Remediation Services
forecasts.description: Site assessment, remediation planning, and cleanup services for contaminated sites. Includes hazardous waste management and long-term monitoring.

forecasts.title: Vessel Maintenance and Repair Services
forecasts.description: Maintenance, repair, and modernization services for Coast Guard cutters and patrol boats. Includes dry dock, mechanical, and electrical work.

forecasts.title: Highway Infrastructure Engineering
forecasts.description: Civil engineering services for federal highway projects including design, surveying, environmental compliance, and construction management.

forecasts.title: Regulatory Analysis and Technical Support
forecasts.description: Technical and analytical support for nuclear safety reviews, licensing activities, and regulatory compliance. Requires nuclear engineering expertise.

forecasts.title: IT Infrastructure Modernization
forecasts.description: Modernization of legacy IT systems including mainframe migration, database upgrades, and cloud adoption for SSA mission systems.

forecasts.title: International Development Program Support
forecasts.description: Program management, monitoring and evaluation, and technical assistance for international development programs. Includes field support services.

forecasts.title: Natural Resource Management Services
forecasts.description: Environmental consulting, wildlife management, and natural resource assessment services for Bureau of Land Management lands. Includes GIS and remote sensing.

forecasts.title: Agricultural Research Facility Upgrades
forecasts.description: Design and construction services for modernization of USDA research laboratories and facilities. Includes specialized equipment installation.
